description:
14 years old. A British born member of the "Jaeger". He is the youngest in Willard`s team but his skills as Jaeger is exceptional. He is a banter but also cynical at times especially towards Yuliy, who keeps to himself. "Jaegers" tend to carry their weapons in musical instrument cases but Philip also carries around violin and likes to play it occasionally.
Source: Official page
name: Philip
